### Personal

I'm a christian, member of the Perdizes Baptist Church in São Paulo, Brazil, a vibrant community, whose mission is to transform lives to serve the King Jesus Christ!

### Experience 

I'm a physicist, working at the Instituto de Pesquisas Energéticas e Nucleares, IPEN/CNEN. My main research fields are Scientific Computing, eScience, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Data Science, all applied to Nuclear, Health and related fields.

I'm also a teacher at Mackenzie Presbyterian University; my current classes on college are: Data Analysis, Parallel Computing, Distributed Computing and Visual Computing for Computer Science course and Distributed Infrastructure for Information Systems course.
